page.title: 06Parkend Silver Band
page.content: Parkend Silver Band which consists of 26 players undertake many engagments .Some for charity, others are charged a fee .An example of recent charity concerts are for multiple schlerosis and the blind . Many carnivals and fetes are attended, as well as regular Bar-B-Cues which pove one of our main money raising functions .A concert which is enjoyed and appreciated is an annual concert given F.O.C.to the senior citizens of the Forest of Dean . These have been organized for many years and each one proves more popular. The bands conductor Mr A.B. Higgins is the son of the founder of the Band Mr William Higgins .Following the family pattern is Mr Higgins son Stephen who teaches the learners sections which consists of approx 10 players.
